name: A Christmas Quest
description:
Welcome to my 'Adventuron 2020 Christmas Jam' entry. 

In this retro style text adventure, you play as one of Santa's Elves, you have been a bit naughty and sneaked out to a party. You drank too much eggnog, ate too many candy canes and mince pies. Then fell asleep!. 

When you woke and finally dragged yourself back to the North Pole, you found that Santa has already left on his present delivery mission. Unfortunately he has forgotten an important present! It is your mission to find the present and somehow figure out a way to catch up to him before he needs to deliver it!

The game will accept assistance commands such as 'HELP', 'HINT', 'ABOUT' and 'CREDITS'.
